statements.select: select pfd.* from PCFirstOnlineCheckDetail pfd where pfd.PCFirstOnlineCheckId=#value# order by pfd.CheckDate

select pfd.* from PCFirstOnlineCheckDetail pfd left join PCFirstOnlineCheck pf on pf.PCFirstOnlineCheckId=pfd.PCFirstOnlineCheckId left join PronoteHeader ph on ph.PronoteHeaderID=pf.PronoteHeaderId where pf.OnlineDate between #startDate# and #endDate# $sql$ order by pf.PCFirstOnlineCheckId,pfd.CheckDate
